text: Order the weirdest latte flavour at a cafe within 2km and post a photo.
Find a local farmer's market and buy something unusual.
Attend a local food festival and try a dish you've never had before.
Visit a local brewery and sample their most unique beer.
Take a cooking class and learn to make a dish from a different culture.
Find a local food truck and try their most popular dish.
Visit a local vineyard and participate in a wine tasting.
Try a dish from a different culture at a local restaurant.
Visit a local chocolate shop and try their most unique chocolate.
Attend a local cooking competition and try the dishes.
